MyWebApp.go:
self.get '/' do 
  main_page 
end

self.get '/class/:name' do 
  class_lookup 
end 

Thread.new { 
  Thread.current[:name] = "MyWebApp"
  self.run!(:server => 'thin')
}

PersistentClass.create:
|superklass|

klass = PersistentClass.new(superklass).klass
self.instances << klass
return klass

RubyTalkDatabase.list: PG.connect.exec('SELECT datname FROM pg_database WHERE datistemplate = false;')
RubyTalkDatabase.tables_for_db:
|dbname|

client = PG.connect(dbname: dbname)
client.exec('SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM information_schema.tables ORDER BY table_schema, table_name')
